description: This is the Raging Stallion debut of Josh Adams, a San Francisco native who can take about as much action as anyone can give! Josh, the star of this amazing movie, starts the action off with an excellent solo that recalls to mind one of our favorite fisting stars of those old Chris Rage videos. Josh, like 1970s porn superstar Bosh Wagner, plays with his open hole, finally shoving his long dangling nuts up his own ass while he fists himself to climax! As far as fisting solos go, this one is hot, hot, hot!
title: Fistpack 4 - Nuts For Butts, Scene #01
